charts.name: myChart
charts.csql: SELECT Left(created,3) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE str_to_date(concat(substring(created,9,2),'-',substring(created,5,3),'-', right(created,4)),'%d-%M-%Y')<=curdate()AND str_to_date(concat(substring(created,9,2),'-',substring(created,5,3),'-', right(created,4)),'%d-%M-%Y')>date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) GROUP By Left(created,3)

charts.name: noTweetsDay
charts.csql: SELECT Count(tid) AS 'noTw' FROM tweets WHERE right(created,4) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') AND left(created,10)=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%a %b %d
